official-title.#text: To prohibit students who have been convicted of a criminal hazing offense under State law from receiving assistance under title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 484 of the Higher Education Act of 1965

header.#text: Loss of eligibility for hazing crime conviction

text.#text: No student who is convicted of a criminal hazing offense under State law shall be eligible to receive any grant, loan, or work assistance under this title.

header.#text: Loss of eligibility for hazing crime conviction

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3898 IH: To prohibit students who have been convicted of a criminal hazing offense under State law from receiving assistance under title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
